items.name: AR Configurator
items.description: Augmenteers is a platform for online retailers to increase performance with 3D product visualizations. We designed and developed a user-friendly experience that lets customers configure the product, scan the QR code and see the model in their room using AR technology. We implemented the front-end of the web app in React.js.

items.name: Augmenteers branding
items.description: The goal was to present Augmenteers as a trustworthy, professional partner for 3D and Augmented Reality solutions, yet maintaining their young and innovative approach. We designed a logomark that represents the interpenetration of two worlds - real and virtual. The result of combining these two parts is a stable construction that shows professionalism and trust.
